verses.verse: <S%H3588>Surely<s%> there is a <S%H4161>vein<s%> for the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H2091>gold<s%> where they <S%H2212>fine<s%> it.
<S%H1270>Iron<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of the <S%H6083>earth,<s%> and <S%H5154>brass<s%> is <S%H6694>molten<s%> out of the <S%H68>stone.<s%>

He <S%H7760>sets<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and <S%H2713>searches<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8503>perfection:<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H652>darkness,<s%> and the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death.<s%>

The <S%H5158>flood<s%> <S%H6555>breaks<s%> out from the <S%H1481>inhabitant;<s%> even the waters <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> of the <S%H7272>foot:<s%> they are <S%H1809>dried<s%> up, they are <S%H5128>gone<s%> away from <S%H582>men.<s%>
As for the <S%H776>earth,<s%> out of it <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> it is <S%H2015>turned<s%> up as it were <S%H784>fire.<s%>
The <S%H68>stones<s%> of it are the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H5601>sapphires:<s%> and it has <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
There is a <S%H5410>path<s%> which <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5861>fowl<s%> <S%H3045>knows,<s%> and which the <S%H344>vulture's<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> has not <S%H7805>seen:<s%>
The <S%H7830>lion's<s%> <S%H1121>whelps<s%> have not <S%H1869>trodden<s%> it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H7826>fierce<s%> <S%H7826>lion<s%> <S%H5710>passed<s%> by it.
He <S%H7971>puts<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H2496>rock;<s%> he <S%H2015>overturns<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> by the <S%H8328>roots.<s%>
He <S%H1234>cuts<s%> out <S%H2975>rivers<s%> among the <S%H6697>rocks;<s%> and his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3366>precious<s%> thing.
He <S%H2280>binds<s%> the <S%H5104>floods<s%> from <S%H1065>overflowing;<s%> and the thing that is <S%H8587>hid<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> he <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H216>light.<s%>
But <S%H370>where<s%> shall <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be <S%H4672>found?<s%> and <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding?<s%>
<S%H582>Man<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> not the <S%H6187>price<s%> thereof; <S%H3808>neither<s%> is it <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
The <S%H8415>depth<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is not in me: and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is not with me.
It <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5414>gotten<s%> for <S%H5458>gold,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H3701>silver<s%> be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for the <S%H4242>price<s%> thereof.
It <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5541>valued<s%> with the <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> with the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> or the <S%H5601>sapphire.<s%>
The <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H2137>crystal<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6186>equal<s%> it: and the <S%H8545>exchange<s%> of it shall not be for <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold.<s%>
<S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H2142>mention<s%> shall be made of <S%H7215>coral,<s%> or of <S%H1378>pearls:<s%> for the <S%H4901>price<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is above <S%H6443>rubies.<s%>
The <S%H6357>topaz<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall not <S%H6186>equal<s%> it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be <S%H5541>valued<s%> with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold.<s%>
From <S%H370>where<s%> then <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom?<s%> and <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding?<s%>
Seeing it is <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living,<s%> and <S%H5641>kept<s%> <S%H5641>close<s%> from the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air.<s%>
<S%H11>Destruction<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> thereof with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H995>understands<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> thereof, and he <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof.
For he <S%H5027>looks<s%> to the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>
To <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H7307>winds;<s%> and he <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%>
When he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of the <S%H6963>thunder:<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> did he <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H5608>declare<s%> it; he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> it, <S%H1571>yes,<s%> and <S%H2713>searched<s%> it out.

And to <S%H120>man<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H136>LORD,<s%> that is <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> and to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
